Home.title: CNC Laser Cutting Services
Home.description: We provide high-precision CNC laser cutting for metal parts with fast delivery and expert service. Request a free quote today!

Blogs.title: CNC Blog Articles
Blogs.description: Explore our latest articles on CNC laser cutting, metal fabrication, and manufacturing innovations.

About.title: About Us
About.description: Learn more about 2dtocut, our mission, and how we deliver reliable CNC laser cutting solutions to clients worldwide.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.description: Please review our terms and conditions carefully before using our website or services.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Your privacy matters. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

FeatureSection.desc: We are a team of experts delivering high-quality laser cutting and engineering solutions with reliable support at every step.
FeatureSection.heading: We Specialize In Delivering Top-Notch
FeatureSection.serviceTitle: We Do Best Engineering Services For You

ExampleWorks.workingGalleryDesc: Discover our high-quality laser cutting works, crafted with precision to meet the unique needs of each project and industry.

Services.title: What We Do
Services.heading: We Provide the Best Engineering Services for You
Services.description: Our expertise lies in precision engineering, offering high-quality services tailored to your needs. From laser cutting to custom fabrication, we ensure efficiency, accuracy, and reliability in every project.

laserCutting.title: Laser Cutting Service
laserCutting.description: Experience high-precision laser cutting with fast turnaround times, ensuring clean and accurate cuts for various materials.

cncMachining.title: CNC Machining Service
cncMachining.description: Accurate CNC machining for complex parts.

customFabrication.title: Custom Metal Fabrication
customFabrication.description: Tailored metal fabrication to meet your needs.

Banner.description: Combine quality and precision with high-accuracy metal laser cutting solutions tailored to your needs.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Get in touch with our team! Have questions or need help? You can reach us anytime.

Examples.title: Examples
Examples.description: Explore our examples of laser cutting and engineering services.

Faq.title: Faq
Faq.description: Explore our examples of laser cutting and engineering services.

File.title: Upload your models
File.drawerTitle: Uploading your CAD is the best way to get an instant quote
File.description: You can easily upload image files (JPG, PNG, JPEG) as well as PDF, DXF, and STP formats.
File.drawerInfo: Your design is safe! Any design uploaded to 2dtocut.com is secure, and you retain 100% of the intellectual property rights.
File.submissionSuccess: Your file and information have been successfully received. Our team will contact you as soon as possible.
File.uploadPrompt: Get an instant quote with STP | DXF | JPEG | JPG | PNG | PDF files
File.secureUploads: All uploads are secure and confidential.

MaterialSection.title: LASER CUTTING
MaterialSection.subtitle: What materials can we cut with laser cutting?
MaterialSection.description: Laser cutting technology allows us to precisely cut a variety of metals.

OrderDetails.fileDetails: Please fill in the file details:
OrderDetails.uploadInProgress: The system is uploading the file, please wait...

materials.name: Aluminum
materials.description: High softness and machinability make it ideal for decoration, kitchen utensils, and sheet coverings.

materials.name: DKP Steel
materials.description: Low-carbon steel suitable for deep drawing, with a smooth and bright surface for painting or coating.

materials.name: Black Sheet
materials.description: Raw steel type used in structural and industrial applications.

materials.name: ST37-K / S235JR
materials.description: Structural steel known for its weldability and cost-effectiveness.

materials.name: Stainless Steel 304
materials.description: Highly corrosion-resistant, ideal for kitchen equipment and medical tools.

materials.name: Stainless Steel 316L
materials.description: Marine-grade stainless steel with exceptional chemical resistance.
